summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Iteration 11 features: 1) Dashboard college cards without images (icon-based design), 2) Scholarship Summary Report API and UI, 3) Target Alerts API and UI. All 14 backend tests passed. Frontend features verified working. Fixed a bug where scholarship breakdown wasn't refreshing when switching between Month/College views.
passed_tests: Backend: Admin login works (200 OK)
Backend: GET /api/admin/scholarship-summary?view_by=month - returns summary, breakdown, recent_scholarships (200 OK)
Backend: GET /api/admin/scholarship-summary?view_by=college - returns college breakdown (200 OK)
Backend: GET /api/admin/scholarship-summary default view is 'month' (200 OK)
Backend: Scholarship summary requires authentication (401/403)
Backend: Regular counselor cannot access scholarship summary (403)
Backend: GET /api/admin/target-alerts - returns alerts structure (200 OK)
Backend: Target alerts structure verified (counselor_id, counselor_name, target_count, etc.)
Backend: Target alerts requires authentication (401/403)
Backend: Regular counselor cannot access target alerts (403)
Backend: GET /api/colleges returns colleges with required fields (200 OK)
Backend: Colleges have all fields for icon-based card design (id, name, city, state, category, established, accreditation)
Backend: GET /api/admin/stats/performance returns stats (200 OK)
Backend: GET /api/admin/stats/admissions-list returns admissions (200 OK)
Frontend: Dashboard college cards have NO images (0 img tags)
Frontend: Dashboard college cards use icon-based design (32 SVG icons found)
Frontend: Dashboard college cards show Featured badge
Frontend: Dashboard college cards show Category
Frontend: Dashboard college cards show Established year
Frontend: Dashboard college cards show Accreditation (NAAC grade)
Frontend: Performance Dashboard loads with all tabs
Frontend: Scholarships tab shows Scholarship Summary Report
Frontend: Scholarships tab shows View By dropdown (Month/College)
Frontend: Scholarships tab shows stats cards (Recipients, Total Awarded, Average, % With Scholarship)
Frontend: Scholarships tab shows Monthly Breakdown table
Frontend: Scholarships tab shows Recent Scholarship Recipients
Frontend: View By dropdown switches between Month and College views
Frontend: College-wise Breakdown shows correct college names
Frontend: Alerts tab shows Target Alerts
Frontend: Alerts tab shows 'All counselors are on track!' when no alerts
seed_data_creation: Existing seed data includes 2 scholarship recipients (Jane Merit: ₹75,000, John Scholar: ₹10,000) at Acharya Institute of Management Studies (AIMS).
context_for_next_testing_agent: Iteration 11 features fully tested and working. Key points: 1) Dashboard college cards redesigned without images - now use GraduationCap icon with gradient background, show Featured badge, Category, Established year, and Accreditation. 2) Scholarship Summary Report API at /api/admin/scholarship-summary supports view_by=month and view_by=college parameters. Frontend shows stats cards, breakdown table, and recent recipients. 3) Target Alerts API at /api/admin/target-alerts shows counselors behind on targets. Currently shows 'All counselors are on track!' since no targets are set. 4) Fixed a bug where scholarship breakdown wasn't refreshing when switching views - added useEffect to re-fetch data when scholarshipViewBy changes.

details: No img tags in college cards (icon-based design)
GraduationCap SVG icon with gradient background
Summary includes total_scholarships, total_amount, avg_amount, percentage_with_scholarship
Breakdown includes label, count, total_amount, avg_amount
Recent scholarships list with candidate details
Stats cards: Recipients, Total Awarded, Average, % With Scholarship
GET /api/admin/target-alerts returns alerts for counselors behind on targets
Response includes current_month, day_of_month, total_alerts, critical_count, warning_count
Each alert has counselor_id, counselor_name, target_count, current_admissions, admission_progress, expected_progress, days_remaining, alert_severity
Shows 'All counselors are on track!' when no alerts
Would show summary cards (Critical, Warning, Day of Month) when alerts exist
Would show alert list with progress bars when alerts exist

bug_fixed.description: Scholarship breakdown wasn't refreshing when switching between Month/College views
bug_fixed.root_cause: Missing useEffect to re-fetch data when scholarshipViewBy state changes
bug_fixed.fix_applied: Added useEffect in PerformanceDashboard.jsx to call fetchScholarshipSummary when scholarshipViewBy changes
